recent_reviews.title: Glad I didn't pay...
recent_reviews.author: Diva Phoenix
recent_reviews.content: Been using 2-3 weeks. Loved this app, yesterday I was prompted to update, now I can't log in from my device. Website login was also down. Contacted support and the guy only served to frustrate & insult my intelligence. He went around with me for about 20 minutes & told me that their site being the issue was impossible until I pointed out that an inability to access a login screen on THREE different platforms couldn't possibly be user error. Then he finally decided to ask someone & there was, in fact, an issue with the site. I eventually got into the website to write down the notes I needed for my appt. Still cannot access via the app on my iPhone... & now as a result, I also have a bunch of notes that I have to enter in - which COMPLETELY defeats the purpose of a "convenient" digital app.

recent_reviews.title: No surprises
recent_reviews.author: Abel's baby mama
recent_reviews.content: It was really surprising to me to realize how uninvolved/uninformed I was about my healthcare, until I had an issue. After downloading CS and then getting all my records, I was shocked to see how much information I was unaware of. There were health issues that I would have followed closer if I would have known. Additionally, I feel much more informed and in control of my info...not like I'm at the mercy of my Dr's office or any others. I can be more active in my own healthcare management. Tons of data in the hands on a few docs, no collaborating, but now I can be the common factor, not just what they know about me, but my whole medical picture.

recent_reviews.title: Great apps!
recent_reviews.author: Grzhop4
recent_reviews.content: Love this app and it meets my daily needs! ğŸ˜�

recent_reviews.title: Finally
recent_reviews.author: EpatientsUnite
recent_reviews.content: Finally there is a solution for me to manage my own healthcare. Caresync has made it very easy for me to own my  health records so that I'm better prepared and educated for all of my doctors visits. Finally I'm in control instead of blindly relying on my doctors.

recent_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
recent_reviews.author: emmitc_PT
recent_reviews.content: As both a consumer and provider of health care, I have found that having one's medical records so accessible to be truly beneficial. I have been able to provide all my new providers my health history with ease after my relocation. I had a photo of my insurance card handy in CareSync when I broke my foot in a race out of state and ended up in the ER.   I recommend CareSync to all my patients with chronic health conditions, those who are caretakers and anyone who wants to take an active role in their health care.  Healthy or sick, if you are a consumer of health care, CareSync is a must have app!

recent_reviews.title: CareSync
recent_reviews.author: Dragonfly Ribbon
recent_reviews.content: I can't get my data all entered yet because it crashes every time I try! I suspect this will be a nice tool to use, but so far it won't stay open. PLEASE FIX!

recent_reviews.title: Made my doctors visit matter
recent_reviews.author: jenkd2
recent_reviews.content: Caresync has made a huge difference during my doctors visits and I'm a relatively healthy person! Dr's spend more time with you and are genuinely excited about how engaged you are. And now I have a complete health record, which literally did not exist before. Will be recommending to all of my family.

recent_reviews.title: Saved me money
recent_reviews.author: tpazz313
recent_reviews.content: My daughter had X-rays done on her arm at the emergency room and when we went to orthopedist, they wanted to do them again because they had not received them yet. Good thing I had them in my CareSync account. That was good enough for them.  No need to redo.

recent_reviews.title: In control!
recent_reviews.author: BP33!
recent_reviews.content: As a father, I find it very reassuring that I now have my children's medical information with me when I take them to the doctor. I'm now armed with all the information to make every visit to the doctor a successful one because of Caresync. I seriously feel in control of my children's healthcare.

recent_reviews.title: In control of my healthcare
recent_reviews.author: wardamneagle_jwg
recent_reviews.content: Finally an application that let's me get and manage all of my health information. CareSync Plus is simply amazing. Any doctor and any time I have all of my information. It's completely changed the way I interact with doctors and the care I get.

recent_reviews.title: Super easy!
recent_reviews.author: FLAFamily50
recent_reviews.content: Can't believe how simple and easy getting my health records collected and made available to me this was. An incredible tool for helping me manage my own health records. Now I have my history in one safe place.

recent_reviews.title: My health record with me anywhere!
recent_reviews.author: VeraPoly17
recent_reviews.content: I have CareSync plus and have my health records from my major providers in the app. I have a list of all medications I have ever taken right there with me and the appointment dates and notes. My favorite option in the all is Fax, I can fax my records to anyone at anytime from my phone. It has been so helpful to have this information on me at doc appointments, I feel a lot more involved when the doc talks to me.

helpful_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
helpful_reviews.author: Bebkie
helpful_reviews.content: I highly recommend this app to everyone. It helps me keep track of all my familyâ€™s medical information. I added my doctors and medications and everything fell into place. I use it daily to log my symptoms, take medications, check for appointments and add my blood pressure. It helps me to keep organized. I love that I can add appointments and have them sync to my calendar. Itâ€™s not a perfect app, but itâ€™s the best I could find and believe me I have tried a lot of them.

helpful_reviews.title: Amazing!
helpful_reviews.author: Handsnotfull
helpful_reviews.content: CareSync was able to the retrieve medical records for our adopted child that our agency was unable to get. The app helps me coordinate my childâ€™s care among a team of 8 specialists. Thank you for helping us keep our child healthy!

helpful_reviews.title: I like where their going, but...
helpful_reviews.author: DJ Hunt
helpful_reviews.content: In the past I would have given this app ra;ve reviews, alas yesterday, June 30, 2018, I found out that the CareSync Developers have been disbanded and the doors are closed.  Unless other developers pick up this app, I tend to believe that they will shut down their Data Server some time in the near future.  Is there a similar medical record keeping application that will Import the CareSync Data?

helpful_reviews.title: An inexpensive way to tackle rising healthcare costs
helpful_reviews.author: co18co
helpful_reviews.content: Each year, our healthcare expenses increase and we are forced to pay an increasing amount of attention to the healthcare we consume.  CareSync has helped me gather all of my family member's health records, and has made them useful to me- they are on my iPhone. I have recently shared up-to-date immunizations with my son's pediatrician, avoided duplicate (expensive) tests at the ER, and was able to share concise clinical updates with my primary care doctor.  Everybody is in the loop, my doctors treat me with respect, and I know the CareSync team is working on my behalf.  Highly recommend for anybody coordinating care for loved ones or managing chronic illness.

helpful_reviews.title: Poor excuse for a time saving health tracker
helpful_reviews.author: owndao
helpful_reviews.content: Spent 3 hours last night trying to get this obsolete app to exchange data with my diabetes health tracking app that supports Health Kit as do all the measurement apps I use. This one supports about 5 apps via some other, apparently little used protocol. I've examined two of those apps and find them as bad or worse than this. The communication is Internet connection dependent even between apps on the same device! As for communicating with my physician, I'm at the mercy of text-only communication. Strictly "stone knifes and bear skins", state of the art 1970. To the distributor, please update the app to support Apple's Health frameworks ASAP. This apps functionality would be more efficiently served by a paper labbook, a xerox machine and the US mail.

helpful_reviews.title: My doctor believed me!
helpful_reviews.author: BondGirlLisa
helpful_reviews.content: I have been going to the doctor for a long time for a chronic condition.  Every time I see a new specialist, I have to start over with my story.    I started using CareSync and took the information with me to the next visit. No more questions, no more eye-rolling, no more starting over with the same labs and treatments. She saw it in black & white (I faxed my records from the app) and said, "Oh, you really have had all this."  My visits are productive, I go less often, and I'm taking less medicine now that I'm communicating effectively.

name: MTBC PHR
description: MTBC Personal Health Record (PHR) has brought its users the satisfaction of having direct access to one’s detailed health information and background.  Scheduling appointments with your doctor and viewing medical history was never this easy. PHR is a safe and user-friendly application to keep track of all your lab reports, claims and amount you owe. Furthermore, it provides the convenience to view all your health and appointment history and saves time if you wish to schedule an appointment with your doctor. Now available in market, this application is going to be with you wherever you go, linking you to your provider and your health records 24/7.  PHR offers an easy to use interface where you can cruise through the following options:  • Appointments:  Gives you flexibility to setup an appointment with your provider and cancel them pre-hand if required.  • Health History:  Holds directory of your medical history, medications, allergies and immunization records. • Claims History:  Provides ease of access to records of claims that have been submitted on your behalf. • Lab Reports:  Saves time and effort by providing you with a database of all the lab results for the tests you have undergone.  • Secure Messaging:  Helps you to connect with your provider via direct and secure messaging. • Demographics:  Allows you to update or edit any personal details such as Phone Number or Address.  Other features include: • Attractive interface for users • Sign up option for unregistered patients • Ease to clear claims by using online payment   • Smart search functionality for  appointments & claims  • Archive important messages  • Providing access to your health measurements taken from Withings, Fit Bit and iHealth devices to your providers with your permission.  Download this application and forget managing all those different medical files that you had to keep record of; this ‘all-in-one’ application is the solution to all your problems.  Note: The data collected from Apple Health app will only be shown to your Doctor to help them understand and diagnose better. We use your location periodically  to Auto Check-in you when you visit Doctor office.  This app may use your location even when it isn’t open, which can decrease device battery life.

name: bant - Simplifying diabetes
description: Track your lifestyle (blood glucose, meal photos, step counts, and weight).  Get personalized insights.  Improve your diabetes.  bant integrates with the Health app to read and write your weight and blood glucose readings.

recent_reviews.title: Great upgrade, modern look
recent_reviews.author: LuchoM
recent_reviews.content: Review update, Dec 6, 2016:  This new version looks great and it now works flawlessly with IOS10. It now syncs with the Apple Health app, instead of the Microsoft Health Vault; you can choose different times of testing, pre or post meal time. Great update.  As soon as I upgraded my iPhone 5S to IOS10, the syncing function with MS Health stopped working and gives an error message instead. This app needs updating.  Review update: June 26, 2017:  I am getting duplicate entries for every log. Why? The only difference is the occasion (post dinner v. post snack).  This seems to be a bug.

recent_reviews.title: Does not Sync with MS Healthvault
recent_reviews.author: Bronx1949
recent_reviews.content: After upgrading to iPhone v10 the Bant appt produces an error when and will not sync with MS Healthvault. MS Support says issue is with Bant. Bant Support does not appear to exist, at least they never respond to any queries on the issue. Bant responded to me and advised they will no longer support iPhone. So why is the app still available at the Apple Store to download.

recent_reviews.title: Useless
recent_reviews.author: HellyJo
recent_reviews.content: No instructions on how to use could not log numbers glad it was free even .99 would be to much also to write a review HAD to DO to MANY would not take nickname

recent_reviews.title: Almost fills the bill
recent_reviews.author: DigitalDoug
recent_reviews.content: Really like the basic functions of this app, does the data collection and tracking suffice for me. Quick and Easy.  However the main feature that attracted me in the first place, the ability to tweet,   For me, it's iffy at best. Some times it will tweet, most times it won't, and I have to copy/paste over to the Twitter app which had no problem.  Not perfect but, for free, it's OK.

recent_reviews.title: Tweeting
recent_reviews.author: Josh Puckett
recent_reviews.content: If you're going to advertise tweeting at least deliver. That is the only thing that sets this app apart.

recent_reviews.title: Keep working at it
recent_reviews.author: T1_20yrs
recent_reviews.content: Tracking BG without any ref (except time) isn't terribly useful, add spots for short/insulin, and meds would be very nice. Also, food intake would be great. I realize that there other apps that do this, but none (that I've found) which link to Google.

recent_reviews.title: I'll update when they fix this
recent_reviews.author: smartblond
recent_reviews.content: For some reason there is no room for those of us that don't work traditional hours. My day starts at 1pm. This app won't allow that

recent_reviews.title: Best free app for easy Type 2 monitoring
recent_reviews.author: tyler_h
recent_reviews.content: I was just diagnosed with Type II a few weeks ago, & I knew the best way to track my sugars (the way I would consistently do it, anyway) was with my iPhone. I tried several free apps & overall have been happiest with this one. I especially like the Google Health interface. My only request would be an option to manually input readings via some keypad/scroll wheel method like the other apps (perhaps this could be a user enables option?). I sometimes have trouble getting the slider exactly where I want it, & I just think a more straightforward input method might be convenient for some people. I had no problems setting up custom labels for all the different times of the day I check my levels. The Twitter feed is a nice addition to read what others are doing. Thank you to the developers for creating this free useful app.

recent_reviews.title: It's getting there...
recent_reviews.author: eonshadow
recent_reviews.content: Let me start with this statement. This app has potential. I absolutely love the fact the blood sugars are sent to my google health profile. My endo can see my blood sugars in near real-time!  Now let's get down to brass tax. The interface can be infuriating. I want to be able to graphically see where my blood sugars are, but not have to place them graphically. An option to add blood sugars with using the telephone layout keypad would provide a fast entry solution. I would like to be able to send my insulin intake to google health. please add support for this. additionally, i would like to be able to log my carb intake.  Granted, i know, there are many other apps out there that do things similar to what i am describing. I have used them and have only found one that does most of these. This app would be the best because of the google health integration!

recent_reviews.title: Awesome!
recent_reviews.author: jpop825
recent_reviews.content: I don't know what everyone else here is complaining about...   1. You can customize as many categories as you want, such as Pre-Lunch, Post-Lunch, Other, Fasting.  You can set as many of these as you want. 2. it is very easy to place the dot.  What you do is slide around until you find your number, then pause there for a few seconds and it will lock it in.  You DO NOT have to let go at just the right spot. If it is wrong (which seems rare for me) you can just touch it and move it again.  My only complaints are that (1) the X and Y axes of the graph are flipped compared to most blood sugar graphs.  From left to right you have the reading, and up and down is time of day. If there was an option to change that so that it could be shown either way this would be a 5 star app! (2) Daily/Weekly/monthly overlay (by time) graphs would be nice too. Lastly, (3) I'd like not only a % in range but a % above and % below.  Just more information.  FANTASTIC app overall.  Great job!  Keep up the great work!

recent_reviews.title: Pretty much useless
recent_reviews.author: • Khai •
recent_reviews.content: Too simplified, doesn't give you the option to enter random bg. And who would share their bg's on Twitter or store them at google health? There are many good apps to track your blood glucose levels so my advice is to skip this one...

recent_reviews.title: Simple to use - but most advanced
recent_reviews.author: Ronski92
recent_reviews.content: This is the only diabetes app (or any medical app for that matter), that stores your data to a real PHR - Google Health.  Great work!  Where's HealthVault though?  Like the new ability to set your own context to anything you want.  Love the twitter integration - all my diabetes friends are there!  I'm not sure what Daiysed is taking about below - unless he's using an old version.

recent_reviews.title: much to basic no settings
recent_reviews.author: Daiysed
recent_reviews.content: This looked like it was going to be a pretty good app I liked the graphics ....but I Keep a different schedule only imput is from 9.am. to 9 p.m. and you cant add Random or Fasting samples just B/L/D not ever gonna work for me very hard to get the time and Glucose levels input in the correct area Instructions would be helpful too!

recent_reviews.title: Skip this one
recent_reviews.author: Dlimke
recent_reviews.content: Nice that it's free, but very difficult to accurately drop the data marker in the right place. Also, you can only input data for meal times and I check at other times of the day, also. Nice that you can send data to Google Health account, thought. A couple of interface tweaks would vastly improve this app.

recent_reviews.title: Totally useless piece of junk...
recent_reviews.author: the_vermonter
recent_reviews.content: As a type 2 diabetic, I've already tried and discarded many diabetic log apps. This one is the worst of all. The interface is difficult to use and even worse to figure out. You cannot limit testing to just breakfast, lunch, dinner and bedtime. Entering readings is nearly impossible along with the time of day. No documentation means it is impossible to synchronize with Google Health. It may be free but that only means it aint worth nothing...

recent_reviews.title: WOW - Very Cool
recent_reviews.author: goblinstar
recent_reviews.content: This is an amazing App. Extremely well done graphics very intuitive and OMG I can share my results within my support group. AND its free. Thank you. Great job!!!

name: Medical Wiz - Family Health Information
description: Keep you and your family’s medical info here in Medical Info.   Check and export medical info anywhere any time with your iOS devices.   What you can save into this app will surprise you: general basic info, emergency contacts, allergies, taken medications and logs, prescriptions, dietaries, immunizations, hospitalizations and surgeries logs, diagnoses, tests, family info and insurance, physicians and visits plan, and eyesight.   For the test logs, you can add test like, blood pressure, glucose, bone density, cholesterol, chem-7, CMP, colonoscopy, complete blood count, complete urinalysis, CT Scan, EEG, EKG, Endoscopy, Ferritin, Weight, Temperature, Height, Hemoglobin A1c, Immunoglobulins, Kidney Function, Liver Function, Mammogram, MRI, PET, Prothrombin Time, PSA, Routine Urinalysis, Spirometry, Thyroid Function, Total Iron Binding Capacity, Ultrasound and X-ray.   You can choose which logs you want to track from above.   Doctors also can use this app to track your patients’ info.   Here is the detailed info you can track:  ⁃ General basic info: contact, employment, weight, height, blood type, and social habit etc.  ⁃ Emergency contacts: name, phone number, relationship, email and address.  ⁃ Allergies: Item, reaction and severity.  ⁃ Medications: name, dosage, frequency, reason, side effect and reminders etc.  ⁃ Prescriptions: name, number, physician, pharmacy and phone number.  ⁃ Dietaries: name, type, quantity, begin date and reason for this.  ⁃ Immunizations: vaccine name, received date and reminder for each.  ⁃ Hospitalization: reason, start date, outcome, hospital name and stay length.  ⁃ Surgeries: Date, procedure, result, hospital and attending physician.  ⁃ Tests: test type, keep logs, and generate report tendency.  ⁃ Diagnose: Date, symptom and treatment.  ⁃ Insurance: companion name, phone, ID No., address, group No., coverage and copays.  ⁃ Physicians: Name, type, phone, email and address.  ⁃ Visits: Time, doctor name, purpose, question, outcome and reminder.  ⁃ Eyesight: visual impairment, eyeglasses and contact lenses.   Other features:  ⁃ Add unlimited profiles and track their medical info separately.  ⁃ Supports Air Print.  ⁃ Support US and SI unit.  ⁃ Passcode protection.  ⁃ Supports Touch ID as passcode. ⁃ Dropbox Backup and Restore.  ⁃ Export logs in form of PDF, CSV or HTML.  ⁃ Supports iPhone and iPad version.   If you have any question or suggestion, please email to thelinklinks@gmail.com.

recent_reviews.title: Upgrade will not load
recent_reviews.author: Gregg milliken
recent_reviews.content: I also paid for upgrade and the upgrade will not load, it just times out and I got it so I could print my information. Not happy feel like I was taken.

recent_reviews.title: Won't upgrade
recent_reviews.author: Tbraun00
recent_reviews.content: I wanted it for my family, and paid for the upgrade. Every time I try to add another person it tells me I need to upgrade...already did that. I restarted my phone, and deleted and reinstalled the app...still not working. Not pleased.

recent_reviews.title: Bought it
recent_reviews.author: topazserenity
recent_reviews.content: But mine version does not have anything it says it has and I have the pro version. What gives

recent_reviews.title: So far so good
recent_reviews.author: Mommmacee
recent_reviews.content: Just what I was looking for. An easy to use app to allow recording of personal medical information so that it is at your fingertips when needed for doctors' appointments or in an emergency situation.  Does not synchronize with doctors' portals, but that was not what I was looking for.   I just began and am still inputting data, but think this will be a great resource.

recent_reviews.title: Nice
recent_reviews.author: Foxie Lee
recent_reviews.content: I needed a new medical information app as My Medical that I have has not been working so this one seems to be the one to put all our information in and you can buy the pro for $2.99 as so worth it.  If you have any problems the developer is very nice at helping and responding.

recent_reviews.title: I think this app is amazing!
recent_reviews.author: Halfpint 44
recent_reviews.content: Anyone looking for a good way to store all there medical info! This is for U!!! It really helped me ðŸ˜Š

recent_reviews.title: Useful but needs improvement
recent_reviews.author: Data Type II
recent_reviews.content: Great at keeping records but graphs are lacking. Needs to have a cleaner view of history.  Having all the data in one place is nice. Would be nice to be able to link to computer. It is better than the others out as you don't have to sign in. Great feature.

recent_reviews.title: Awesomely Handy
recent_reviews.author: M.P. Foltz
recent_reviews.content: This is a great app. As a dialysis patient I need to have all my medical information organized and in one place. This awesome app is not only handy but also organized. Making it easy to get your medical information to first responders and other healthcare professionals, even if you are not able yourself.       My only suggestion would be to make it so we could take pictures of our prescription bottles, actual pills, test reports, insurance cards, receipts, and other medical related things.

recent_reviews.title: Medical Wiz
recent_reviews.author: Tiny1966
recent_reviews.content: Love it!

recent_reviews.title: Very helpful but too complicated
recent_reviews.author: ellen1101
recent_reviews.content: Being a Parkinson's and diabetic as well as a heart patient I see quite a few Doctors as well as being a hospital patient. It also means I take a slew of medicine. All this information needs to be written down somewhere and being able to put it on the phone is sure handy. It's great to have every important piece of medical information at you fingertips. My primary Doctor loves the program as well as the nurses in the hospital. When they ask a medical question I have it right with me. I've ever given the phone to the nurse so she can get the needed information herself. Although it's pretty self explanatory and intuitive, its still very slow, a little confusing and a pain that keep updated. Another improvement would be some way of overriding the finger print ID. In case of an emergency it's nice going to do any given from anybody

recent_reviews.title: Good apps
recent_reviews.author: Habits.
recent_reviews.content: Goodapps

recent_reviews.author: Busylady329
recent_reviews.content: I don't see a place to journal my body's behavior. I am a senior with changes happening and I want to log them.

name: Healthjump
description: A simpler way to communicate with your doctor, schedule appointments and manage your health.  Features:  - Request your medical record  - Securely exchange messages with your doctor - Easily request appointments - Centrally manage all your medical records - Review past appointments and corresponding documents  Why Healthjump? Patients are embracing a bigger role in their healthcare as valuable information is becoming more readily accessible electronically. With Healthjump, it is now easier than ever to ensure your doctor has the most up-to-date information about you and your health. For the first time ever Healthjump enables you to access and share your medical record with your doctors and specialists. Find new doctors and communicate with your current care team all in one secure personal health record app.

recent_reviews.title: Health Jump not what I thought
recent_reviews.author: Lonewolf52
recent_reviews.content: I thought this app was where you could go and see test results without paying for an office visit. ....... WRONG.  It gives you nothing like that.  I wish I could give it less then a one rating.

recent_reviews.title: Useful
recent_reviews.author: supercharged2011
recent_reviews.content: Very useful. I am able to message my doctors instead of waiting on hold listening to their crappy on hold music. I also got my records from most of my doctors, which is helpful because I travel a lot.

recent_reviews.title: Crap
recent_reviews.author: Alecwestchester
recent_reviews.content: Alerts that I am not using current version, nope current version.  Document alerts but no documents to view or already view them. Does not compare Epic or other products!

recent_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
recent_reviews.author: Stowelighthouse
recent_reviews.content: In the past, it has been such a headache for me to get my medical history to specialists.  With this I was able to get my latest MRI to my doctor immediately and chat with the doctor after the visit just to make sure we were on the same page. I would recommend Healthjump to anyone that sees multiple doctors on a regular basis.

recent_reviews.title: Very Useful!!
recent_reviews.author: Njhecker90
recent_reviews.content: Great way to manage my doctors in one place. Sent a message to my specialist and received a reply back in the same day!

recent_reviews.title: Waste of time
recent_reviews.author: Dishoffish
recent_reviews.content: This program is a SCAM and not even linked with my doctor's office. I received an invite to use this ap to schedule appointments but when I showed up the doctor wasn't even in that day and staff said they don't use this program. Don't waste your time on HealthJump!

recent_reviews.title: Amateurish
recent_reviews.author: Biggestbopper
recent_reviews.content: Does not work with iOS 8.   On iOS 7, entering data is a problem as you move to the lower part of the screen (on a phone). Cannot edit insurance policy info once saved - you have to delete and re-enter.

recent_reviews.title: Love it!
recent_reviews.author: Bego36
recent_reviews.content: I cannot wait to upload all my records and to stop doing paperwork at every doctor's visit!

recent_reviews.title: Neat! Wish I Had It Three Years Ago
recent_reviews.author: Sal from Cambridge
recent_reviews.content: I wish this had been around three years ago when I had my heart surgery. I was going from hospital to hospital trying to decide on where to have the surgery. Getting my records sent from one system to the other was a hassle, now I could do it on my iPhone!

recent_reviews.title: Loved it

recent_reviews.content: Great app!

name: YourHealthRecord Mobile
description: Much has been said about the potential of computers and the internet to revolutionise health care, and the focus of this attention has been on the provision of an electronic health records. Most health care providers and health professionals agree that the universal availability of an electronic health record would be a major advance in the provision of high quality health care. In the interests of better health care we are happy to provide, free of charge, a sophisticated, high quality electronic health record. Welcome to Your Health Record! Your Health Record provides a convenient place to store all your health related information, including doctor visits, hospitalisation, surgery, medications and treatments. It also allows simple centralised storage of documents, reports and images. Information can be stored and accessed by any of your designated health professionals at your discretion. Your Health Record allows tracking and analysis of entries to monitor treatments and disease progression and provides an important repository of useful information such as medication anaesthetic or other allergies, vaccination history and symptom history Information can be displayed or printed as a summary, for quick evaluation by health professionals Your Health Record provides a single comprehensive easily accessible medical history which allows health professionals to more accurately diagnose, monitor and treat medical conditions. You have the ability to simplify and improve your health care by creating a health record, so why not make a start.

recent_reviews.title: good app!

recent_reviews.title: Can't access
recent_reviews.author: AckerIpod
recent_reviews.content: So I have finally gotten used to where everything is on this app and entered a ton of information- a ton having a special needs, medical needy son. My issue is the last time I needed the info, I was at a doctors office that didn't have wifi therefore was unable to get the info I needed. I like this app or the idea of this app because then I have all of his dr names (17) and phone number at a moments notice, however if there is no wifi I can't get the info and that stinks! I also have his many medical conditions and meds including dosage when needed, but again does me no good if I can't access it when I need it.

description: Available exclusively for patients of QuadMed, the MyQuadMed app gives you secure access to manage your personal health care on the go - right from your mobile device.   With MyQuadMed you can: ·         Schedule and manage your appointments ·         Secure message with your QuadMed provider ·         Access your secure QuadMed health records  ·         View your QuadMed health center contact information and available services

recent_reviews.title: Endless “Verify Email on Website” Loop
recent_reviews.author: Just Want To Post Thie Review
recent_reviews.content: Would be really convenient if I could actually get INTO it... even after verifying my email address it still tells me I have to complete this step on the website prior to using the app.  Looking forward to taking advantage of the app once this gets sorted out, since there is no place to contact anyone on the main website for app support.

recent_reviews.title: Terrible app
recent_reviews.author: Pdsloan
recent_reviews.content: App will not let you go in and book am appointment with anyone as it defaults to today and tomorrow.  Even if there is am appointment with doctor available,if it is outside this range you cannot select it from the calendar. Poor excuse for an app and needs fixed asap to ever be a viable alternative to calling them on the phone.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.  Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.  Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.  Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. name: RaceAddict
description: Running Application:  Do you register for multiple races a month?  Do you plan your weekends around your next race?  Do you find yourself searching through your inbox time after time to find pertinent race information?  Are there race medals hanging from every doorknob in your house?  If so, you may be a RaceAddict!!!  RaceAddict is an easy to use app that enables you to track your upcoming and previous races in one location. Record your upcoming race information, including start time, location, date, and distance. Once you have finished the race, you can easily add your results and effortlessly sort your data to review your race history and PRs.  Teater / McNerney / Cooper 2016

recent_reviews.title: Share with Friends

recent_reviews.content: I love this app to help keep me straight, but I wish there was a way to share my schedule with friends

recent_reviews.title: Awesome App
recent_reviews.author: Runnergirl89
recent_reviews.content: This app is fantastic for storing all of your race info, past, present and future. PR times are saved for all distances. The app is very user friendly and the support is quick and responsive. I noticed an issue with the app connecting to WiFi over the weekend and by Monday there was a fix! I really enjoy using this app to keep all my race data in one place.

recent_reviews.content: Iâ€™ve been using this app since it launched. Best $1.99 Iâ€™ve ever spent! I am a true Addict with at least 1 Race (if not more) every weekend. Iâ€™ve come to rely on it for keeping track of my races and times. No more spreadsheets that you canâ€™t access on your phone on the go. After over 4 years of using this app, Iâ€™ve only experienced 2 problems. When I had entered over 100 races, the app didnâ€™t display that many. I promptly messaged them and they went to work on a fix/update. Then this weekend there was an iOS problem with logging on. I messaged them again and received a prompt answer that they were working on a fix. Awesome communication and I suggest messaging them with your problems before leaving a bad review!

Only thing I'd recommend for future versions, is ability to input races that have a date range last couple days (rundisney challenges or Ragnar relays) and then I can see how future versions could even have a connection to some of the more major races where you input race name and maybe it inputs some of the basic info info for you. But otherwise great app and perfect since there really is nothing else out there like it for managing race info like this! Completely worth the money!

recent_reviews.title: Great app!
recent_reviews.author: Racer987216
recent_reviews.content: This is a fantastic app for the price. It has lots of neat features, including the ability to display race location, mapping, and website within the app, as well as the handy ability to text or email all race details at the touch of a button. It also stores notes and expo information for each race. I love the unique graphical interface. A few suggestions for future updates:  1 add a checkbox within each record called "entry fee received." Races with this box checked display a different color in the future races list. It would also be nice to have the ability to sort future races by this status, i.e. "show only races with entry fee paid" checkbox.   2 add the ability to delete a record.   3 add the ability to print race details.   4 add the ability to search the notes or expo field.   Overall a great app for the price. Highly recommended.

recent_reviews.title: Great app...
recent_reviews.author: Blah blah 12345
recent_reviews.content: Love that I can put all the info for each race. Wish it would sync with the race website and I wish I could print the list of races. I have double work now since I still have to make a spreadsheet to print.

recent_reviews.title: Worth it!
recent_reviews.author: pinguinlvr
recent_reviews.content: This is so worth the money. Now I have all my race information (past & future) in one spot. No more going to multiple places to see how I've done and how I can improve. Great app!!

recent_reviews.title: Where has this been my whole life?!?!
recent_reviews.author: Tabithaq
recent_reviews.content: Love it, love it, LOVE IT!!  I'm a 50 stater and thus is just what I need. I have a bucket list a mile long. Currently I keep it all in a spreadsheet. Completed race, future races and a wish list.  Now I can keep it all in a handy app.  Just a couple ideas for future updates:  *Ability to add a picture for each race  *A 50 stater tab. It would list each state and then show you every race that you've done there.   *A wish list check box. So you can enter the race info and mark it as wish list. name: MedXCom for Patients
description: Take control of your health and well-being—anytime, anywhere!  The MedXCom Patient app is a revolutionary patient portal that lets you store and manage all of your health information, and instantly share important data and updates with your doctors. This FREE app gives you full control over your personal health care—you decide what to store, what to share, and who gets to see it.  Manage your health profile with confidence and convenience.  With the free MedXCom Patient app, you can store health profiles for yourself and all of your dependents in one convenient location. Intuitive interfaces make it easy to input as many health profiles as you'd like, with as much detail as you want to include.  With the MedXCom app, you can:  • Get reminded when to take your medications • Upload all of your medical records, including surgical history, allergies, medications, and more, in just a few minutes • Store images of your health insurance card and driver's license for faster processing through health care facilities • View and update your profile anytime, in just a few seconds • Add unlimited dependent profiles • Add providers to your “Health Team” to easily share medical records with doctors • Instantly notify your health care providers if a health emergency occurs  Get powerful security for your personal information.  MedXCom Patient is HIPPA certified and complies with all medical privacy standards. Only you and your authorized providers will be able to view your health records and profile information. You can convert all your paper records into one convenient storage app, and rest assured that your private data is safe.  Optimal wellness, your way.  Download the FREE MedXCom Patient app today, and enjoy the convenience, flexibility, and enhanced quality of care you'll get with your secure, one-stop health profile, along with improved communications with your healthcare providers.

name: Backpack Health
description: Backpack Health – Your health information always on hand.   Sometimes health information can feel scattered and out of reach. Backpack Health wants to help you keep it all together, so that you can spend less time tracking it down and more time getting (and giving) the care and support you need.  Organize and manage your health details in the way that makes the most sense to you: • Conditions, procedures, medications, allergies, complementary care, labs, genetic results, and more – if it's important to your health journey, keep it in your Backpack • Record your health info using a comprehensive dictionary of clinical and everyday terms – we give you lots of options to help you find what you're looking for • Add photos, videos, audio, and files to your Backpack to complete the picture  • Instantly translate your health info into multiple languages, even without an internet connection  Include the people you love: • Add profiles for the ones you care for (as many as you want) • Kids, aging parents, anyone whose info you need to have on hand, Backpack Health lets you keep it all in one place • Invite others to co-manage your loved ones' profiles with you – you can collaborate to stay on top of their care  Share the information you need to with the ones who need it most: • Use unique Share Cards to control what information you share with whom • Share specific Emergency info so that it's there when you need it  • Share the most up-to-date info with unique secure URLs • Use a unique URL to keep emergency info on medical ID jewelry or in your phone’s Medical ID • Add your files and notes to Share Cards  Wherever you go, Backpack Health makes it easy to carry the stuff that matters, and share it with those who need it.   ---  You can access Backpack Health with a Basic plan or a PRO plan. PRO plans require a monthly or yearly subscription which you select during signup or subsequently from the Account Subscription option in the app.    PRO plan payments will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of this purchase.  There is a 7 days trial period for your initial subscription, during which you can cancel at any time without being charged. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited with a subsequent subscription purchase during this period.   Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.    Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.    For further information, please see our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: https://backpackhealth.com/privacy-terms

name: Healee
description: Healee connects you with a doctor to get a reliable expert advice directly from your phone, regardless of where you are and when you need it. Forget having to wait months to see a specialist, skip the crowded waiting room, and speak with our top doctors now! With Healee, you can also keep a comprehensive health record, connect with your own doctor, and use the Artificial Intelligence (AI) guided Healee Chat to better understand your symptoms.  FEATURES *********************** - Get professional advice from leading specialists Simply describe your symptoms, attach pictures and share test results (if applicable), and a doctor will reply with an expert advice and treatment options. You can now request a consultation within seven specialties: endocrinology, urology, imaging diagnostics, gastroenterology, ophthalmology (eye diseases), orthopedics and traumatology. Stay tuned - we are gradually expanding the range of available specialties!  - Track your health We let you store and manage all your past and present symptoms and conditions, log treatments, set medication schedules and reminders, check drug and allergy interactions, upload lab results and images, and explore your health data using a set of visual charts and reports. The feature integrates with Apple's HealthKit.  - Better understand your symptoms with Healee Chat Our AI-guided Healee Chat is the far better alternative of googling your symptoms, guessing and needlessly worrying. Enter your symptoms, and Healee Chat will ask questions to narrow down the potential explanations, and then provide a list of conditions that could explain your symptoms, along with a next-steps advice or the option to refer you to the right specialist.  - Keep your personal doctor close Besides seeing one of our specialists, you can also connect and stay touch with your own doctor. You can share your health data, so that your doctor can closely monitor your health in real time and notify you should a problem occur.  - Share with people like you The best advice about a health condition often comes from other people in the same boat as you. You can easily and safely share your data on health forums and communities, to ask for people's help and advice.  FAQs *********************** - Who are the doctors? All doctors with whom you can connect via Healee, certified and practicing in the EU, are carefully hand-picked to give you top quality care and expertise.  - How do doctor consultations work? You send a description of your problem, along with pictures, and you get a response from one of the doctors, within 16 to 48 hours, depending on what delivery priority you choose. The response contains information about your condition, together with treatment advice.  - Can I use Healee with my doctor? Yes. Besides seeing one of the specialists who work with us, you can also connect and stay in touch with your own doctor, or any other doctor you choose. The respective doctor just needs to install our dedicated Healee MD application and you can then connect by scanning the doctor’s code from within the Healee application.  - Is my personal and medical information safe? Yes. Both your health and privacy are our top priorities. Even we do not have access to any sensitive personal data that can potentially identify you. We do not have access to your email address, and the images and messages you exchange with doctors. All this data is stored encrypted on our servers and apart from you, only doctors have access to it.  - Can doctors prescribe medications through Healee? No, initially, we are not going to offer prescriptions. However, we are planning to introduce this option soon - doctors will write prescriptions for non-controlled medications that can be fulfilled within the European Economic Area (EEA) countries.

name: Medical Wiz Pro - Family Health Information
description: Keep you and your family’s medical info here in Medical Info.   Check and export medical info anywhere any time with your iOS devices.  What you can save into this app will surprise you: general basic info, emergency contacts, allergies, taken medications and logs, prescriptions, dietaries, immunizations, hospitalizations and surgeries logs, diagnoses, tests, family info and insurance, physicians and visits plan, and eyesight.  For the test logs, you can add test like, blood pressure, glucose, bone density, cholesterol, chem-7, CMP, colonoscopy, complete blood count, complete urinalysis, CT Scan, EEG, EKG, Endoscopy, Ferritin, Weight, Temperature, Height, Hemoglobin A1c, Immunoglobulins, Kidney Function, Liver Function, Mammogram, MRI, PET, Prothrombin Time, PSA, Routine Urinalysis, Spirometry, Thyroid Function, Total Iron Binding Capacity, Ultrasound and X-ray.  You can choose which logs you want to track from above.  Doctors also can use this app to track your patients’ info.  Here is the detailed info you can track: ⁃ General basic info: contact, employment, weight, height, blood type, and social habit etc. ⁃ Emergency contacts: name, phone number, relationship, email and address. ⁃ Allergies: Item, reaction and severity. ⁃ Medications: name, dosage, frequency, reason, side effect and reminders etc. ⁃ Prescriptions: name, number, physician, pharmacy and phone number. ⁃ Dietaries: name, type, quantity, begin date and reason for this. ⁃ Immunizations: vaccine name, received date and reminder for each. ⁃ Hospitalization: reason, start date, outcome, hospital name and stay length. ⁃ Surgeries: Date, procedure, result, hospital and attending physician. ⁃ Tests: test type, keep logs, and generate report tendency. ⁃ Diagnose: Date, symptom and treatment. ⁃ Insurance: companion name, phone, ID No., address, group No., coverage and copays. ⁃ Physicians: Name, type, phone, email and address. ⁃ Visits: Time, doctor name, purpose, question, outcome and reminder. ⁃ Eyesight: visual impairment, eyeglasses and contact lenses.  Other features: ⁃ Add unlimited profiles and track their medical info separately. ⁃ Supports Air Print.  ⁃ Support US and SI unit. ⁃ Passcode protection. ⁃ Supports Touch ID as passcode. ⁃ iCloud Backup and Restore. ⁃ Dropbox Backup and Restore. ⁃ Export logs in form of PDF, CSV or HTML. ⁃ Supports iPhone and iPad version.   If you have any question or suggestion, please email to thelinklinks@gmail.com.

recent_reviews.title: Uploading MR
recent_reviews.author: tataylor1233
recent_reviews.content: This app has no way to upload your medical records from either your healthcare provider or your insurance company which is what I was looking for.

recent_reviews.title: I really want/need this to be a great app, but it’s not there, yet.
recent_reviews.author: mrsbrick
recent_reviews.content: I have tried at least a dozen different medical apps... This is one of the better ones, it is the start of a really great app, but it definitely needs some additional options. First, I would really like to upload some documents from doctors. Often when we see doctors we get A LOT of handouts about treatment plans, etc... I would really like to upload those to this medical app so everything is in one place. You also really need to have a way to track symptoms, like when my child is sick or running a fever, I’d like to track his temperature, when he has last vomited, etc... I would also like to be able to track height, weight, BP, pulse and even better would be peak flow measurements. Also, with the medicine, a way to track when medication is taken and due, etc.. Not just what we are regularly taking. Being able to see when we had the last dose of pain reliever or cough medicine would be amazing. PLEASE MAKE SOME IMPROVEMENTS SO I CAN FINALLY HAVE A MEDICAL APP THAT DOES WHAT I NEED IT TO DO.

recent_reviews.title: Simple to use covers the basics
recent_reviews.author: terry978
recent_reviews.content: I needed a program that I could record medical information. This program is simple and straightforward, very easy to use. You don’t have to use a proprietary cloud to save your data. It saves/retrieves your data to either the iCloud or Dropbox which is great. It’s one disadvantage is that it is a bit inflexible. This is a very promising application that would be great with a few minor additions. The single item I would suggest to improve is adding the capability to add tests. I have had several lung, kidney, bone marrow and liver biopsies, but I cannot enter them because these aren’t in the fixed list. I am sure there are many other types of tests that aren’t listed. The graph function doesn’t work properly but this is minor. I would also suggest adding a section for date/time of an advanced directive as this is very important.

recent_reviews.title: Updates
recent_reviews.author: Blue Vylet
recent_reviews.content: I love this app but I'm concerned about doing the new iOS update. It states all apps must update to work properly. Are you going to do an update to make it compatible. I would hate to loose all my data.

name: iBlueButton®
description: Our team of physicians and technologists has designed iBlueButton to specifically serve Medicare beneficiaries, Veterans, individuals covered by Tricare and their family caregivers, to have with them at all times their medical information in their hands so that they can better manage their healthcare. iBlueButton won the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services Industry Innovation competition for Blue Button, a federal initiative giving Veterans and Americans covered by Medicare or Tricare the ability to download their health records from patient portals offered by these federal programs.   For Medicare beneficiaries and their caregivers, iBlueButton lets you automatically login into your account at MyMedicare.gov and retrieve your medical history over the last three years to your phone or tablet. iBlueButton organizes all your information with lists of medications and diagnoses which you can research and annotate. Find all your physician visits, hospitalizations, tests or get the contact information of all your providers. iBlueButton also works with the MyHealtheVet and Tricare portals to retrieve your Blue Button health records the VA and the Military Health System.   iBlueButton enables you to easily pull, assemble, annotate, research and securely store your health records directly on your mobile devices so that your most critical health information is available at any time. A multi-profile application, iBlueButton lets you manage your own health records and that of your loved ones who you are helping manage their care.   • Life and Cost Saving - On average every year, a Medicare beneficiary sees seven different physicians in four different locations, and most of the time anyone of these physicians don’t have a view of the full medical history of their patients, which can be the cause of medical errors, unnecessary tests, and avoidable healthcare expenses. Veterans and military personnel & their families experience the same healthcare issues, as their care takes place in VA / military health facilities, and the private sector. iBlueButton helps you prevent dangerous medical errors by delivering anytime-anywhere access to your list of current medications, diagnoses, and medical history, along with contact information for your physicians and family caregivers. iBlueButton reduces unnecessary costly or redundant tests, imaging services, and procedures by sharing your past tests and procedures with your doctors.   • All in Your Hands - iBlueButton pulls and organizes all records in a Summary Record, with all critical information in easy to view sections for medications, conditions, immunizations and allergies.  • You in Control - iBlueButton gives you control over your health records or that of your loved ones. With iBlueButton you can look up, research, and annotate medications and side effects, understand obscure medical terminology, and be informed to effectively manage your family’s healthcare with your physicians. With the tap of a button, you can also note medical record errors or mark sensitive information as private that you may not want to share with some providers.  • Secure and Private - Unlike most personal health record applications, iBlueButton stores your information on your own personal device, where it is securely encrypted and unlocked only by you via password or biometric access. None of your data is processed or stored in the cloud or seen by Humetrix as you do not create an account with us. Your health information remains privately kept by you on your device, with no risk of tampering or hacking in the cloud.  • EMR Records via Direct - Automatically receive your summary health records from providers using federally certified EMRs (e.g., Cerner) via the secure Direct protocol. iBlueButton automatically generates Direct addresses for you to give to your physician for you to receive your health record in iBlueButton. Humetrix is committed to secure EMR records access, including via emerging FHIR APIs.

recent_reviews.title: Bloatware:  DO NOT BUY
recent_reviews.author: fmanans
recent_reviews.content: Frequent crashes, timeout errors on VA, Medicare, Tricare sites:  much faster going directly to the site(s) with i.d. password downloading via Blue Button option.  Lacks very important secure messaging feature required to communicate with providers regarding your medical record!

recent_reviews.title: Keeps all the easily overlooked details in order
recent_reviews.author: lo171
recent_reviews.content: This app has been a massive help—my mother (who’s on Medicare) has been dealing with chronic health issues, which means lots of doctors and lots of medications. I live out of state, which makes it extremely difficult for me to keep track of what’s going on; iBlueButton keeps all of her doctors’ contact info in one place, should a crisis situation occur. Plus, it keeps all her meds listed in a format she can show to a new specialist, to make sure she’s not given anything that will react poorly with the meds she’s already on.  Having a sick parent is hard no matter what, but it’s much easier to deal with when you’re not having to prompt them for details they’d rather not think about.

recent_reviews.title: Useful app for VA / TRICARE
recent_reviews.author: CurtisCurtisSoAwesomexxxxppppp
recent_reviews.content: I was active duty for 28 years and am now covered by the VA.  I found the app intuitive and was able to quickly get both my TRICARE and VA records, all aggregated in one place. Sweet.

recent_reviews.title: Nurse approved
recent_reviews.author: LesterzzzzooooLesterxxxx
recent_reviews.content: As a nurse, I find this app incredibly useful. To have all of a patient’s medications in one place is a real lifesaver. I treat a lot of Medicare beneficiaries and I’ll be spreading the word about this.

recent_reviews.title: Medicare record works great
recent_reviews.author: RobertoxxxxooooppppRoberto
recent_reviews.content: Recently became a Medicare beneficiary. Heard about this and tried it and got my Medicare record.  Working great so far!

recent_reviews.title: Worthless
recent_reviews.author: Microtechs
recent_reviews.content: This app is worthless for personal medical history. It doesn’t store near enough information to make it worth $0.99 let alone a whopping $15.  You can’t add when you started or stopped medication. There’s no place for dates of anything. There’s really no place for previous surgeries, dates and notes about the procedures and outcome. You can download from just a few sources if by chance your physician happens to subscribe to the service.  Wasted my money. You’d be better off spending the money trying out 4 or 5 other apps that at least have fields to input data that you really need when you see a doctor or go to a hospital and they need your medical history when your in severe pain or have to remember years back.

recent_reviews.title: Works great; always getting updates
recent_reviews.author: YormaK
recent_reviews.content: We use this app all the time to manage our entire family's medical records.  Works great!  And it's nice to see the commitment from the developer to always keep improving and updating this app.

recent_reviews.title: Not worth it
recent_reviews.author: Humando
recent_reviews.content: I can't even get it to download from one of the four EMR platforms for which it was designed. I want my money back.

recent_reviews.title: Awesome app
recent_reviews.author: YouSnoozeYouLoose
recent_reviews.content: This app is absolutely fantastic and definitely the best out there.

recent_reviews.title: Essentially Abandonware
recent_reviews.author: August23rd
recent_reviews.content: the last update as of this post was at the end of may of last year, frequently crashes, I regret ever paying for the app, it DOES NOT connect with Apple Healthkit as a data source... (you'd think you could/should but it doesn't).   Worthless app. You'd think at 15 bucks they'd actually hire a developer to maintain the app but nope.

recent_reviews.title: Crashy, user-hostile garbage
recent_reviews.author: Kirkkerekes
recent_reviews.content: This app is terrible -- it crashes all the time, and is pretty much impossible to use because of brain-dead design decisions.

recent_reviews.title: The Worst App EVER
recent_reviews.author: In92101
recent_reviews.content: I have tried twice to make this app do what it says it will do, without any success. Can't even set up a profile that doesn't immediately disappear. Interface is not the least bit intuitive. I question whether any of the 5-star reviews are by real people not affiliated with the developer. I have downloaded hundreds of apps and used them successfully. I've never paid more for an app than what I paid for this. Totally disappointed. Please save your money.

recent_reviews.title: Beware: Doesnt sync with any insurance or doctors offices
recent_reviews.author: FourteenthCenturyGirl
recent_reviews.content: Great concept but Very limited network. Mainly for vets. Syncs with 5 things: VA, aetna, medicare. No hospital networks or insurance like BCBS. Cant see how to enter results manually. I want my money back.

recent_reviews.title: Tracking My Medical History

recent_reviews.content: I'm very happy that this app has allowed me to carry my records in my phone. it is very easy to go to a new doctor and speak about my conditions and have my current medications handy. with the updates that I keep downloading I am pleased that this app will continue to be worked and not neglected.

recent_reviews.content: Could not be happier with this app. I'm so pleased that there is a convenient way for me to carry my healthcare records with me to every doctor's appointment. As a Medicare patient, this app is a lifesaver.

recent_reviews.author: HeavySleeper
recent_reviews.content: Total POS for $9.99  Deceptive---does an exceptionally poor job of capturing or storing your health data.  Useless---iBlueButton does not connect to your clinical data with Probability = 0.9 or higher. A 2nd lie.  Humetrix has pulled the wool over another patient's eyes. Shame on Humetrix.

recent_reviews.title: Very Disappointing & Misleading Features
recent_reviews.author: TPalm002
recent_reviews.content: Not Worth Purchasing - For the price and the noted awards/recommendations. I was expecting a well thought out application incorporating EMR non-EMR physician records.  Unfortunately the user ‘input’ interface is impossible to use.  Example), The immunization list is extremely limited.  Typical travel immunizations (typhoid, Yellow Fever, Rabies etc) are not listed nor can you manually add them.  For older folks the MMR may be broken out into two immunizations but there is no place to add this kind of info OR comments on the type of serum used or dates that boosters or TB tests were taken Example 2)  There is no place to manually put lab/tests or results.  These are very basic things that are easily transferable from a manual RMR into an EMR language.  I really would like my money back on this.

recent_reviews.title: Mr
recent_reviews.author: Gold 44
recent_reviews.content: After calling Humetrix they said they would look into the problem of not being able to connect to the VA. They called me back and said there was a problem on their end and now it is fixed. Now it works just fine. Great customer service.

recent_reviews.title: Easy way to get medical records
recent_reviews.author: DataDoc2012
recent_reviews.content: The iBlueButton app gives you quick and secure access to your private medical information maintained by your medical insurance company or by Medicare. When you see your doctor, you can use this app to connect with their iPad and push the information to them.   Having this app means I never have to see a doctor again without having key medical information about myself available and ready to review!

recent_reviews.title: Fantastic medical record app
recent_reviews.author: Ramoramarami
recent_reviews.content: Very well-designed medical record app. It lets you download your medical information in text and CCD formats from your multiple doctors. It links from your medications or your procedures to reliable information on the web. It lets you securely send your medical information to a new doctor, if you're traveling. You can create a record for each member of your family, even your dog. The advanced standards behind this app will allow it to communicate with other apps, Like a health risk assessment. I like it. It helps me better manage my health. Stay well!!

recent_reviews.title: Very useful!

recent_reviews.content: Super convenient and well engineered, definitely worthwhile.

recent_reviews.title: Not useable (iOS 7 issue?)

recent_reviews.title: Mr.
recent_reviews.author: wizkid67
recent_reviews.content: I didn't know there was a way I could keep track of my medications and diagnosis on my phone until I found this app. I really like how easy it is to read my Medicare record - This app has the potential to save lives

recent_reviews.title: DESIGN IS WORTHLESS
recent_reviews.author: Racketo
recent_reviews.content: I can't even put in answers for the security questions.   It's not obvious if the answer has been entered.   The last two questions can't be read in their entirety.   "What was the name if your hig..."  "Where did you meet..."  NO idea what is being asked.   Please go back to app school:  BASIC DESIGN 101

recent_reviews.title: Not Super Impressed
recent_reviews.author: ErsatzRubric
recent_reviews.content: As someone who just has normal insurance coverage through Aetna, this app doesn't do much for me. It allows me to basically download a multi-page PDF from my insurance company and push it to a doctor. Helpful for vacations I suppose but it would be a lot more useful if the data was downloaded into a more interactive app that I could add more information too. Also it only lets me download info about myself versus my whole family.

recent_reviews.title: Health Records Without Paperwork
recent_reviews.author: sandnsrf
recent_reviews.content: Now I can get my health records wherever I am. This is great! No more paperwork. It simplifies my life.

recent_reviews.title: Great mobile-health app
recent_reviews.author: Yorma
recent_reviews.content: I follow mobile-health initiatives and am familiar with the Blue-Button initiative for putting patients in control of their health information.  This is a fantastic tool that does just that!  It's perfect for Medicare patients.  I'm going to tell my parents about it.

helpful_reviews.title: Keeps all the easily overlooked details in order
helpful_reviews.author: lo171
helpful_reviews.content: This app has been a massive help—my mother (who’s on Medicare) has been dealing with chronic health issues, which means lots of doctors and lots of medications. I live out of state, which makes it extremely difficult for me to keep track of what’s going on; iBlueButton keeps all of her doctors’ contact info in one place, should a crisis situation occur. Plus, it keeps all her meds listed in a format she can show to a new specialist, to make sure she’s not given anything that will react poorly with the meds she’s already on.  Having a sick parent is hard no matter what, but it’s much easier to deal with when you’re not having to prompt them for details they’d rather not think about.

helpful_reviews.title: Worthless
helpful_reviews.author: Microtechs
helpful_reviews.content: This app is worthless for personal medical history. It doesn’t store near enough information to make it worth $0.99 let alone a whopping $15.  You can’t add when you started or stopped medication. There’s no place for dates of anything. There’s really no place for previous surgeries, dates and notes about the procedures and outcome. You can download from just a few sources if by chance your physician happens to subscribe to the service.  Wasted my money. You’d be better off spending the money trying out 4 or 5 other apps that at least have fields to input data that you really need when you see a doctor or go to a hospital and they need your medical history when your in severe pain or have to remember years back.

helpful_reviews.title: Works great; always getting updates
helpful_reviews.author: YormaK
helpful_reviews.content: We use this app all the time to manage our entire family's medical records.  Works great!  And it's nice to see the commitment from the developer to always keep improving and updating this app.

helpful_reviews.title: Nurse approved
helpful_reviews.author: LesterzzzzooooLesterxxxx
helpful_reviews.content: As a nurse, I find this app incredibly useful. To have all of a patient’s medications in one place is a real lifesaver. I treat a lot of Medicare beneficiaries and I’ll be spreading the word about this.

helpful_reviews.title: Useful app for VA / TRICARE
helpful_reviews.author: CurtisCurtisSoAwesomexxxxppppp
helpful_reviews.content: I was active duty for 28 years and am now covered by the VA.  I found the app intuitive and was able to quickly get both my TRICARE and VA records, all aggregated in one place. Sweet.

helpful_reviews.title: Medicare record works great
helpful_reviews.author: RobertoxxxxooooppppRoberto

Lacks very important secure messaging feature required to communicate with providers regarding your medical record!
